name: DodgeTheRona
description:
A BLACKTHORNPROD GAME JAM #3 production !

IMPORTANT: GAMEPAD IS NECESSARY! It should work with keyboard too, but because of a bug, it won't. I will upload a version without this bug after the Jam is over :)

You are a nice old granny, trottin' about merrily, when suddenly, some loud people - wearing inexplicable red caps - force you to run for dear life.

Can you evade the masses until it's your turn to get vaccinated?

Programming & 'art' by Bastiaan, vocals by Bastiaan & Luitzen
